document.full_text: nearly two-thirds of americans agree with president barack obama's decision not to release graphic photos of the dead al qaeda leader osama bin laden, according to an nbc poll to be released on monday.
document.title: majority agree with obama decision on bin laden photos: poll
lines_and_colors: nearly two-thirds of americans agree with president barack obama's decision not to release graphic photos of the dead al qaeda leader osama bin laden, according to an nbc poll to be released on monday.
